mapper.select: select info.feedbackid,info.feedbacktime,info.memberid,info.feedbackmsg,info.feedbackimg,info.replymsg,info.`status`,info.feedbacktype , (select IFNULL(mem.realname,mem.phonenum) from member_info mem where mem.memberid=info.memberid) membername from feedback_info info where info.feedbackid=#{feedbackid}
mapper.update: update feedback_info set status=#{status},replymsg=#{replymsg} where feedbackid=#{feedbackid}
